response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present an extraordinary opportunity for you to acquire a unique product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This item holds immense value to me and I am eager to share its potential with someone who will appreciate it as much as I do.

I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value, making it an exceptional deal for you. By accepting this offer, you will not only secure a valuable asset but also potentially unlock new opportunities that align with your goals.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am here to provide you with all the information necessary to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
